welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Chelmek, Poland! Known for its picturesque scenery and rich history, we invite you to immerse yourselves in our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Paul II Balice International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at John Paul II Balice International Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pyrzowice Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Pyrzowice Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time or data limit.
